body.content:
*Mr Mr.Adams T. Eric*
*Produzir Para Transformar*
*Rua 1 Congresso do MPLA, No 7-17*
*Caixa Postal 1316, Luanda Republica de Angola*




*Sir/Madam ,*

*I introduce my self as Mr.Adams T. Eric,a  financial expert consultant
with SONANGOL Holding, national oil drilling company of Angola.*

*My client by the names Isabel Dos Santos solicit for your help in a good
cordial business relationship and to expand our various financial horizions
.*

*I am presently in Republic Of South Africa  for inspection on Sonangol
Holdings FISCAL ACCOUNT with their financial affiliate company for the
First quarter of the year 2021. I have been in this exercise for couple of
months .*

*Having received our full account report, I discovered a SONANGOL HOLDING
unpaid voucher to the tune of US$300,000,000.00 under the supervision my
Client Isabel De Santos. This voucher has no base and could not be balanced
in our ledger.*


*On my comprehensive report and her advice :*

*  - The funds should be invested overseas*
* -   An MOU should be legalized between the both parties in the court*
* -  The investor must be reliable and credible with capacity to investhuge
funds in lucrative businesses*
* -  An affidavit of trust must be identified*


*Our areas of concentration are :*


*Textiles, Information technology,Pharmaceuticals, Oil & Energy Industries,
Mining & Metals Industry,Management Consulting Industry, Maritime industry,
Hospital & Health Care Industry, Consumer Services Industry, International
Trade and Development Industry, Gambling & Casinos
Industry,Electrical/Electronic Manufacturing Industry, Insurance
Industry,Chemical industries, Marketing and Advertising
Industry,Leisure,Travel & Tourism Industry, Agriculture, Aviation,
Retail,Import and Export, Trade and development industry, Real Estate &
Construction Industry and any other viable profitable investment
opportunities in your region is welcomed .*


*These decision came as a result of the Sonangol’s new chief executive
Carlos Saturnino criticised Isabel Santos and opened an internal inquiry on
her tenure .*


*Following the ongoing investigation panel in the Republic of Angola by the
new transition Govt , we decided not to inform the Govt treasury and
Sonangol managements about the floating funds with no base in the Sonangol
ledger .Telling the Govt will bring about questions because Isabel denied
the mismanagement of funds during her tenure  *


*-view
(https://www.today.ng/news/africa/angola-probes-isabel-dos-santos-time-sonangol-chief-92708
<https://www.today.ng/news/africa/angola-probes-isabel-dos-santos-time-sonangol-chief-92708>)*


*We are set to move the funds out of Africa for the proposed investments by
using our insider's in the South African Bank to move the funds$300m to
your bank co ordinate .*


*We will rely on your professional ideas and trust to work with you. Kindly
respond to this proposal with your full contact if you have a reliable
investor .Please kindly reply me through regular email address for more
details (andersoncedward@yahoo.com <andersoncedward@yahoo.com>)*


*Utmost confidential please .*


*Yours truly,*

*Mr.Adams T. Eric*
